title: Pre-jail sightings
html_content:
This article is still yet to be completed due to stress.

We get a lot of stressful torture in our lives that makes us crash into slumber. Given that inspiration is a big variable, and we may have been lacking of it, this article will be completed as soon as possible, at our own pace... HONEST!


This article, like Chris's pickle, is a bit small. You can help CWCki by expanding it.

Since his discovery on the Internet, there have been many sightings of Chris over the years. Chris is notably not fond of people taking Bigfoot style pictures of him.[1]

Contents

    • 1.1 June
    • 1.2 July
    • 1.3 August
    • 1.4 November

    • 2.1 September
      • 2.1.1 Walmart

2010

June

Main article: Fridays After Five

July

Main article: Fridays After Five

August

November

2011

September

Walmart

On 3 or 4 September 2011, Chris was spotted and photographed at a Walmart.

2013

January

McDonald's

On 29 January 2013, Chris was spotted and photographed eating at a McDonald's.

September

On 22 September 2013, Chris was spotted and photographed.

2014

April

On 5-6 April 2014, Chris was spotted and photographed at Target by Reddit user u/cabelaman.[2]

2015

February

On 5 February 2015, Chris and Barb were spotted and photographed leaving the courthouse after their hearing for the 26 December 2014 incident.

April

On 2 April 2015, Chris was spotted and photographed going to McDonald's before his hearing and then was photographed outside the Charlottesville Circuit Court.

2016

September

Toys "R" Us

On 11 September 2016, Chris was spotted and photographed at Toys "R" Us.

2018

August

On 13 August 2018, Chris was photographed, apparently unrecognized, by a fellow patient in a waiting room at a Region Ten therapy location. The other person had noticed Chris's unusual outfit with accessories usually associated with girls and posted the photo to Twitter with the comment, "Who's girl is this". Chris replied saying he wished the person had spoken to him instead of taking the photo without his knowledge.[3]

2019

April

Target

On 15 April 2019, Chris was spotted and photographed at a Target by Reddit user OMalley_The_AlleyCat. The Reddit user wrote:

Saw him at target today. Wanted to say hi but got nervous. I was having a shitty day but after seeing him, felt so much better. Thanks Chris!

Unknown date

Sometime in either 2020 or 2021, Chris was spotted and photographed. The photo itself however was not released until March 2023 shortly after Chris's release from jail. The photo was first posted as a hoax first post-jail sighting, something that would not actually happen until 1 May 2023.

References

  1. ↑ Toys for Tots
  2. ↑ https://www.reddit.com/r/WTF/comments/22boak/saw_chris_chan_in_target_today_looks_like_hes/
  3. ↑ August 2018 social media posts#Caught red handed
